# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a default set of properties.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Use a layout properties instance to provide information about a type that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Layout] protocol. For example, you can create a layout properties instance in your layout’s implementation of the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Layout/layoutProperties] method, and use it to indicate that the layout has a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Axis/vertical] orientation:

```swift
extension BasicVStack {
    static var layoutProperties: LayoutProperties {
        var properties = LayoutProperties()
        properties.stackOrientation = .vertical
        return properties
    }
}
```
title: init()
